info.task: read information about a breadcrumb link
info.title: Read information about a breadcrumb link in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnLastBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link
testPageDocument.querySelector('[aria-current="page"]').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link, read information about the link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Breadcrumb Example' link, read information about the link.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
